definitions.text: the state of inactivity following an interruption
examples: during the halt he got some lunch
the momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow
he spent the entire stop in his seat
it came to a stop at the bottom of the hill

definitions.text: an interruption or temporary suspension of progress or movement
examples: a halt in the arms race

definitions.text: come to a halt, stop moving
examples: She stopped in front of a store window

definitions.text: stop the flow of a liquid
disabled in the feet or legs
